issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: After upgrading Titanium Studio to 3.3.0 the distribution configurations are missing.
fields.summary: Distribution configurations missing from Launch Configurations in "Run Configurations" after 3.3.0 Update

comments.body: In 3.3.0, the launch configurations are tied strictly with the launch mode. The distribution configurations are moved specifically to package mode. In the global launch toolbar, if you change the launch mode to package, and then open the 'Configurations...' dialog (in the drop-down of launch shortcuts), it will show up the distribution configurations.
I have noticed. There is one weird thing though. The old distribution configurations are also in the list, but don't work anymore. Creating new ones works as you have stated.
I'm afraid that they have to re-create the distribution launch configurations the launch mode is changed.

Use Appcelerator studio as Titanium is obsolete. Follow the instruction [here|https://web.appcelerator.com/product/studio] to download the latest Appcelerator studio. Also, follow the instruction [here|https://web.appcelerator.com/product/cli] to install CLI, SDK. Hope this helps. Thanks.
